## Usage

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("c-taimal/BayesianMDLGA")
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(BayesianMDLGA)
```


```{r}
str(DataCPSim)
str(DataCPSimRebases)
str(param)
str(pm_25)
```

```{r sim-plot}
plot(DataCPSim)
summary(pm_25)
```
